title: IPageSetup.DrawingColor
description: Sets the color of the drawing for printing.
returns: Color of drawing for printing as defined in swPageSetupDrawingColor_e
remarks:
This method can only be set with an application-level (
IModelDocExtension::AppPageSetup
) or document-level (
IModelDoc2::PageSetup
or
IModelDoc2::IPageSetup
) object. This method is not available at the sheet level.
